Package de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

TNC(C/S) session state machine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientWorking
    Marker to characterize a state as client working state.
    Decided
    Marker to characterize a state as decided state.
    End
    Marker to characterize a state as final end state.
    Error
    Marker to characterize a state as error state.
    Init
    Marker to characterize a state as initial state.
    Retry
    Marker to characterize a state as retry state.
    ServerWorking
    Marker to characterize a state as server working state.
    State
    Generic TNC(C/S) session state to drive the TNC(C/S) state machine.
    StateHelper<T extends TnccsContentHandler>
    Generic helper to make information and commonly used functions accessible to a TNC(C/S) state.
    StateMachine
    Generic TNC(C/S) session state machine to control the message flow for integrity handshakes of a connection.
    StateMachineBuilder<T extends TnccsContentHandler>
    Generic builder to build a TNC(C/S) session state machine.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractState
    Generic TNC(C/S) session state base.
    AbstractStateHelper<T extends TnccsContentHandler>
    Generic helper base to make information and commonly used functions accessible to a TNC(C/S) state.
